fs.fibu2.lang
Class Fsfibu2StringTableMgr

java.lang.Object
  fs.fibu2.lang.Fsfibu2StringTableMgr
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceDependent
public final class Fsfibu2StringTableMgr
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourceDependent

This class provides static methods for reloading fsfibu2 string tables and retrieving a polyglot string loader. It also provides delegate methods for direct string queries which automatically use the global language id.

Author:
Simon Hampe

Method Detail

getInstance

public Fsfibu2StringTableMgr getInstance()

reloadTables

public static void reloadTables()
This methods reloads the fsfibu2 string table and all update tables located in (fsfibu2)/lang/updatetables

getLoader

public static PolyglotStringLoader getLoader()
Returns:
Returns the string loader associated to the fsfibu2 string table. If the string table has not yet been created, it will be loaded first.

getString

public static java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String id)
Queries for the unformatted string given by the id under the global language id using the fsfibu2 string loader

                                  throws java.util.MissingFormatArgumentException
Queries for the formatted string given by the id and the arguments under the global language id using the fsfibu2 string loader

Throws:
java.util.MissingFormatArgumentException

assignReference

public void assignReference(ResourceReference r)
Assigns a resource reference. r == null indicates that the default reference should be used
